function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in mosquito-borne diseases due to excess vegetation and green zones","Impact":"Local disease outbreak, potential health risks for the population","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of green areas, implementation of mosquito control measures, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Mosquito control technology, surveillance and monitoring systems","People":"Local residents, visitors to green areas","Owner":"Local authorities, park management"},{"Description":"Thermal discomfort in tropical countries due to excessive vegetal mass","Impact":"Reduced livability, discomfort for residents and visitors","Mitigation":"Use of increased shading, optimization of green coverage, urban design strategies for heat reduction","Technologies":"Urban design planning, shading solutions, heat mitigation technologies","People":"Local residents, urban planners, architects","Owner":"City authorities, urban planning departments"},{"Description":"Varied effectiveness of greening strategies in different climatic conditions","Impact":"Inconsistency in effectiveness of strategies, potential waste of resources","Mitigation":"Site-specific assessment, customized greening strategies based on climate, adaptive management approaches","Technologies":"Climate data analysis tools, adaptive management software, green infrastructure planning tools","People":"Climate specialists, urban planners, environmental engineers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, urban planning departments"}]}
